kb3.name: kb3_mails
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_mails` ( `kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kll_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `kll_external_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `kll_hash` binary(16) NOT NULL, `kll_trust` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `kll_modified_time` datetime NOT NULL, `kll_crest_hash` char(40) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`kll_id`), UNIQUE KEY `time_hash` (`kll_timestamp`,`kll_hash`), UNIQUE KEY `external_id` (`kll_external_id`), KEY `kll_modified_time` (`kll_modified_time`) ) Engine=MyISAM;
